item.description:
Do you want to remove the blockages in your life preventing you from experiencing Love’s presence?

 

Join Cindi Lane as she introduces to you the psychology of Spiritual awareness. A Course in Miracles is a steppingstone for people searching for their spiritual calling and a path that will  lead them to Enlightenment. Learn about Love and fear, and that they are our only two true emotions ~ all unpleasant emotions are born out of fear while joy, peace and forgiveness all extend from Love. Discover how these emotions affect your life daily and learn what you can do to take control of your journey and find spiritual clarity.   

This program will run weekly throughout the year, every week we will cover 7 chapters in the program. Students will be doing daily reading on their own to prepare for each class. All students need to purchase the book in advance in order to sincerely learn and grow in the process of understanding and accepting miracles and the possible miracles they can bring into their life. Learn to live from LOVE~.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: A Course in Miracles- Weekly Program with Cindi Lane
